content:
| Segment | Starting Position | Ending Position | What Happened |
|---------|-------------------|-----------------|---------------|
| WOW County suburbs | Lean R | Voted R | Economic messaging failed to persuade |
| Madison progressives | Strong D | Soft D | Enthusiasm gap, lower turnout than 2020 |
| Fox Valley swing voters | True swing | Lean R | Lindquist's business credibility won |
| Union households | Lean D | Split | Some broke from endorsements on economy |
| Young voters | Low turnout expected | Very low turnout | No inspiring vision, no reason to engage |
| Seniors | Mixed | Lean R | Inflation concerns dominated |

---
